entry.def: Yemeni means belonging or relating to the Yemen, or to its people or culture.
A Yemeni is a Yemeni citizen, or a person of Yemeni origin.

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Yemen
1. of or relating to or characteristic of Yemen or its inhabitants;

Sentence.sentence: When planes fall from the sky, as a Yemeni airliner did on its way to Comoros Islands in the India ocean June 30, 2009, the black box is the best bet for identifying what went wrong.
